item.description:
This is the first session for a biweekly game based in my homebrew world. Please check out the website for more information.

This first session is going to primarily be for character creation, but the website has information for creating characters on it; this way everyone has an idead of what they're getting into before they arrive. I want everyone to sit down, get to know one another, and create characters together so we start off with a sense of party cohesion before we get going. If all that goes well before the end of the night, we might just start off with a little bit of actual play as well.

Parking is on the street - there is no available off-street parking at our location.

Time may change, but no more than an hour one way or the other.

Bring pencils/pens, dice, and your own copy of the PHB. Bring your own refreshments - please do not bring alcoholic beverages.

For more information, see http://geocities.com/...
item.name: Mordane76's D&D 3.5E Homebrew Game
